Package fs.gui

Class Frame

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
fs.gui.Frame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class Frame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
Frame class that contain the graphic elements and the basic logic of the File Splitter
Author:
antoniopelusi

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Frame()
    The Frame class extend JFrame and contain 3 JPanel: 1) ChopPanel that contain the Chop interface 2) StitchPanel that contain the Stitch interface 3) JobPanel that contain the dynamic Job list.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
    One listener for all the object int the Frame, contain the Chop logic and the Stitch logic.
    void checkSize​(int i)
    function that convert byte to selected unit of measure
    void clearJobList()
    Clear the 2 ArrayList and delete the rows of the job list
    static void printTest()
    the printTest function print all the files stored in both ArrayList used in the File Splitter: 1) Files that contain the Chop jobs 2) Files2[] that contain the Stitch jobs both are dynamic ArrayList stored in JobPanel.

  • Constructor Details

    • Frame

      public Frame()
      The Frame class extend JFrame and contain 3 JPanel: 1) ChopPanel that contain the Chop interface 2) StitchPanel that contain the Stitch interface 3) JobPanel that contain the dynamic Job list.

  • Method Details

    • printTest

      public static void printTest()
      the printTest function print all the files stored in both ArrayList used in the File Splitter: 1) Files that contain the Chop jobs 2) Files2[] that contain the Stitch jobs both are dynamic ArrayList stored in JobPanel.

    • clearJobList

      public void clearJobList()
      Clear the 2 ArrayList and delete the rows of the job list

    • checkSize

      public void checkSize​(int i)
      function that convert byte to selected unit of measure

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      One listener for all the object int the Frame, contain the Chop logic and the Stitch logic. This function calls sequentially all the function needed to chop, zip, crypt, stitch, unzip and decrypt. Read the right ArrayList and the relative row in the job list to get the necessary information.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
